backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining smart‑glasses data types, authorization checks, user profiles, blink/vibration storage, and filtering helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plaintext mapping of frontend file paths to brief descriptive summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and light/dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app entry with TanStack Router routes and BluetoothProvider wrapping the layout.
frontend/src/components/actor/ActorBoots: Deprecated wrapper that no longer initializes backend actors and simply returns children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login landing screen using Internet Identity with marketing copy and a login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkRate: Canvas-based chart component rendering blink-rate history with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkSumm: Empty file placeholder for a future blink summary history chart.
frontend/src/components/charts/Vibration: Empty file placeholder for a vibration events chart.
frontend/src/components/device/DeviceSel: Form component for entering and validating a device ID and linking to device management.
frontend/src/components/docs/ApiExamples: Displays API usage examples with tabs and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header with links to dashboard, devices, and API docs.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper providing header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Deprecated dialog for entering a user name; currently always closed.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/S: Displays current alertness state, recent readings, and a button to generate a personalized sleep schedule.
frontend/src/components/time/TimeRangePi: Card containing a time-range selector and helper for converting ranges to timestamps.
frontend/src/contexts/BluetoothContext.t: Provides Bluetooth connection management, notifications, and blink-rate parsing for Web Bluetooth.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the current Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrap.ts: Deprecated hook returning static initialization state with no backend interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useBleWriteQueue.ts: Deprecated BLE write queue hook that always reports an empty, idle queue.
Deprecated hook that no longer flushes summaries and only tracks a placeholder timestamp.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller's user profile from the backend actor once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceId.ts: Manages a persistent device ID in localStorage with validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useEyeRBluetooth.ts: Provides Web Bluetooth connection handling, notifications, and blink‑rate parsing for EyeR devices.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
Stores blink‑rate history locally with add, clear, and auto‑persist behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines backend React Query hooks for fetching and mutating blink data, vibration events, and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordBlinkRateWit: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRollingBlinkRateAv: Maintains recent blink‑rate points and computes a 5‑minute rolling average.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionBlinkRateHi: Tracks in‑memory session blink‑rate history with a capped list.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing live blink-rate data, rolling averages, historical trends, and generates a personalized sleep schedule based on alertness state.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceConnection.tsx: Provides UI and logic for configuring device IDs, managing Bluetooth connections, and saving incoming blink-rate data locally.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceDataIngestion.t: Displays documentation for the device telemetry ingestion API, including required fields and data handling details.
frontend/src/types/bluetooth.d.ts: Defines TypeScript types for Web Bluetooth GATT devices, services, characteristics, descriptors, and related request options.
frontend/src/utils/bleNus.ts: Implements parsing utilities for extracting blink-rate values from Nordic UART Service and heart-rate characteristic BLE payloads.
frontend/src/utils/bleUuid.ts: Provides helper functions to normalize and format BLE UUIDs for Web Bluetooth compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/bleWriteQueue.ts: Implements a localStorage-backed queue for storing blink-rate write operations with enqueue, read, remove, and clear functions.
frontend/src/utils/localSleepSchedule.ts: Generates sleep recommendations based on the last 100 blink-rate data points, computing average BPM and adding guidance based on thresholds and variability.
frontend/src/utils/personalizedSleepSche: Determines alertness state from rolling BPM and returns a predefined schedule plan for high-alertness, normal, or drowsy states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing stored values including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project's local-first architecture plan, known issues, and feature requirements related to removing backend dependencies and using localStorage.
